ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/prowler-cloud/prowler
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Prowler is the Open Cloud Security platform for AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes, M365 and more. It helps for continuos monitoring, security assessments and audits, incident response, compliance, hardening and forensics readiness. Includes CIS, NIST 800, NIST CSF, CISA, FedRAMP, PCI-DSS, GDPR, HIPAA, FFIEC, SOC2, ENS and more
